com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class TableUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.TableUtil

  • public final class TableUtil
extends Object
    Static utility methods related to working with WTable.

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin

      • getCurrentRowKey

        public static Object getCurrentRowKey()
        This can be used by column components on a WTable to determine the current row key.
        Returns:
        the row key for the current row, or null if no row details

      • getCurrentRowIndex

        public static List<Integer> getCurrentRowIndex(WComponent component)
        This can be used by column components on a WTable to determine the current row index.
        Parameters:
        component - the column component
        Returns:
        the row index for the current row, or null if no row details

      • sortData

        public static void sortData(Object[] data,
            Comparator<Object> comparator,
            boolean ascending,
            int lowIndex,
            int highIndex,
            int[] sortIndices)
        Sorts the data using the given comparator, using a quick-sort.
        Parameters:
        data - the data for the column.
        comparator - the comparator to use for sorting.
        ascending - true for an ascending sort, false for descending.
        lowIndex - the start index for sub-sorting
        highIndex - the end index for sub-sorting
        sortIndices - the row indices, which will be updated as a result of the sort
